Detailed Description

A class which defines the basic information about a categorisation field.

Definition at line 20 of file Field.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Field::Field ( string  fieldLabel,
bool  fieldRequired,
bool  fieldReset 
)

The constructor with parameters.

Parameters:
fieldLabel is a description of the field which is presented to the user via the UI.
fieldRequired indicates if the user is required to fill in this field.
fieldReset indicates whether the contents of this field is deleted when continuing with the next item.

string Field::getType (  )  [virtual]

A virtual function to get the type of field.

Returns:
A string is returned which contains the field type.

Reimplemented in CheckField, ComboField, SpinField, and TextField.

Definition at line 107 of file Field.cpp.

Referenced by getDescription().

vector< string > Field::getDescription (  )  [virtual]

A virtual function to get a full description of the field with all its options.

This function returns information about this field. This can be used to generate a category definition file.

Returns:
A pointer to a vector of strings. These strings contain all information of this field: type, label, required, reset and any additional information implemented in the child of this class.

Reimplemented in ComboField, and SpinField.
